languages.text: "Так слухи были правдивы? Я запомню этот высокомерный тон, чтобы щеголять твоими {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}подвигами{/d} в твоем же теле!" {n}Шут смеется, но смех выходит каким-то нервным.{/n}

"So the rumours were true? I'll remember that arrogant tone when I'm the one flaunting your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}exploits{/d} in your body!" {n}The fool laughs, but the laughter sounds nervous.{/n}

languages.text: 「噂は本当だったのか？お前の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}功績{/d}を自慢する時、その傲慢な喋り方を覚えておいてやる！」{n}道化の神経質な笑い声が聞こえた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So the rumours were true? I'll remember that arrogant tone when I'm the one flaunting your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}exploits{/d} in your body!" {n}The fool laughs, but the laughter sounds nervous.{/n}

「噂は本当だったのか？お前の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}功績{/d}を自慢する時、その傲慢な喋り方を覚えておいてやる！」{n}道化の神経質な笑い声が聞こえた。{/n}

languages.text: "Die Gerüchte waren also wahr? Ich werde mich an diesen arroganten Ton erinnern, wenn ich in Eurem Körper mit Euren {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}Taten{/d} prahle!" {n}Der Hofnarr lacht, klingt dabei aber nervös.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So the rumours were true? I'll remember that arrogant tone when I'm the one flaunting your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}exploits{/d} in your body!" {n}The fool laughs, but the laughter sounds nervous.{/n}

languages.text: "Demek söylentiler doğruymuş. İşte o küstah tonunu unutmayacağım, yakında senin bedeninde senin {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}öykülerini{/d} ben övünerek anlatacağım!" {n}Kahkahalar atan soytarının gülüş tonu, belli belirsiz bir tedirginlik içeriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So the rumours were true? I'll remember that arrogant tone when I'm the one flaunting your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}exploits{/d} in your body!" {n}The fool laughs, but the laughter sounds nervous.{/n}

"Demek söylentiler doğruymuş. İşte o küstah tonunu unutmayacağım, yakında senin bedeninde senin {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}öykülerini{/d} ben övünerek anlatacağım!" {n}Soytarı kahkaha atar ama kahkahasında belli belirsiz bir tedirginlik sezilir.{/n}

languages.text: «Entonces, ¿los rumores eran ciertos? ¡Recordaré ese tono arrogante cuando esté fardando de sus {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}hazañas{/d} en su cuerpo!». {n}El bufón ríe, pero se le notan los nervios.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So the rumours were true? I'll remember that arrogant tone when I'm the one flaunting your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}exploits{/d} in your body!" {n}The fool laughs, but the laughter sounds nervous.{/n}

languages.text: “也就是说，那些传言都是真的？等我占据了你的身体，炫耀着你那些{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}丰功伟绩{/d}的时候，我也会用同样傲慢的语气开口！”{n}小丑笑了起来，但他的笑声很紧张。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So the rumours were true? I'll remember that arrogant tone when I'm the one flaunting your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}exploits{/d} in your body!" {n}The fool laughs, but the laughter sounds nervous.{/n}

languages.text: « Les rumeurs étaient donc vraies ? Je me souviendrai de ce ton arrogant lorsque je me vanterai de vos {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}exploits{/d} dans votre propre corps ! »{n}Le bouffon éclate d'un rire quelque peu nerveux.{/n}
